Key Match Events: Jaden Ivey scored 26 points for the Detroit Pistons
Cade Cunningham recorded a triple-double with 17 points, 11 rebounds, and 11 assists for the Detroit Pistons
Anthony Davis finished with 37 points, nine rebounds, and four assists for the LA Lakers
LeBron James contributed 20 points, 11 assists, and eight rebounds for the LA Lakers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The LA Lakers lost 115-103, dropping to 1-3 away from Crypto.com Arena
Detroit improved its record to 3-5 while Los Angeles dropped to 4-3
Others: The game was played on short rest
The Pistons came out fast and grabbed a 15-7 lead after five minutes
LA pushed the pace to open the game, but the hosts thrived in the run-and-gun style
The LA Lakers put on a dazzling show on defense in the third quarter
